segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a disaster—water everywhere, disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's blasting out more, soaking the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's growing, filthy and slippery on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's standing in it, her dress hem getting wet—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping that plate, but her hands must be damp from the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies—hands all sticky already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's tilting in that wet spot; they'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's reaching in, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's palm out, begging—hygiene be damned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks clean; this kitchen's a pigsty by comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow damaging wood—such a wasteful, nasty situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing all this sloppiness go unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water already; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whole scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
